lead_paragraph: An article on Sunday about the successful career of Pat Gillick, the general manager of the Philadelphia Phillies, misstated the age of the veteran pitcher Jamie Moyer, who has played for Gillick in Seattle and Philadelphia. Moyer is 45 — not 46, which he turns next month.
